item.description: pypyrslack.steps.send permalinkSend a message to slack. input permalinkRequires the following context items: slackToken your slack api token. Keep this secure. slackChannel send to this slack channel (include # in front) slackText the body of your message. Use your usual slack formatting chars. substitutions permalinkFor all inputs you can use substitution tokens, aka string interpolation.
